txt.en: Morgul manuscripts can be found in Ghashan-kútot, the Halls of Black Lore.\n\nYou should destroy the Morgul manuscripts.

You have successfully destroyed the Morgul manuscripts within Ghashan-kútot, the Halls of Black Lore, and have done a great service to all those working to reclaim Minas Ithil from the remnants of Sauron's forces.

'Many writings are to be found within Ghashan-kútot, the Halls of Black Lore. If you are to venture inside, I ask you to destroy the Morgul manuscripts within. The horrid writing contained to the halls serves only the remnants of Sauron's forces.'
There is much for the White Company to accomplish in reclaiming Minas Ithil from the remnants of Sauron's forces.
Halls of Black Lore: Morgul Manuscripts
